title: Real-Time Collaboration Tool
description: Built a real-time collaboration tool with dynamic drawing capabilities, enabling multiple users to interact on a shared canvas in real time.
features: Responsive design for seamless usability across devices

title: QTify
description: Designed a music browsing app featuring seamless navigation through albums and genres with an elegant UI powered by Material-UI and Swiper.js.

title: QKart
description: Developed an e-commerce platform offering a variety of products, implementing responsive design for a consistent experience across devices.

title: XBoard
description: Created a news aggregation platform inspired by Flipboard, leveraging HTML, CSS, and JavaScript for a clean, responsive layout.
